Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bombinin-like peptide 2 (Contains: Bombinin H2; toads, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Function: Bombinin-like peptide 2 has antimicrobial activity, but no hemolytic activity. Preliminary evidence indicates that this peptide does not lyse and thus kill the bacteria by its antimicrobial activity. Bombinin H2 has antibacterial and hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from amphibian skin what do they tell us?
Literature.Author: Simmaco M, Mignogna G, Barra D.

Literature.Title: Antibacterial and haemolytic peptides containing D-alloisoleucine from the skin of Bombina variegata.
Literature.Author: Mignogna G, Simmaco M, Kreil G, Barra D.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from amphibian skin: what do they tell us?
Literature.Author: Barra D.,Mignogna G.,Simmaco M.
